title: I have 3 refunds left
body: I bought dunkmaster darius and I want to refund it for 1820 rp and it wont let me, why is that?

replies.body: If that refund option through the purchase history isn't working, just respond to me here saying you're okay with me doing a manual refund and using 1 of your refund tokens and I'll get that done for ya!
Yea im okay with that, I also bought the chromas and I would be willing to refund those as well for a total of 2 refunds. Thanks.

Ahaaaaa that was actually all included in a bundle you purchased! Sorry to be difficult, but since this isn't just a quick one-off refund and is a bundle refund, go ahead and hit up the billing agents in a ticket. They should be able to get it refunded altogether for ya at once.
I made a ticket and its almost been 24 hours and no response. Did I make the ticket to the wrong agents? Is there a link you can send me? Thanks.
